name: Antifa Curse Generator
description:
This is a really simple Processing program that generates different combinations of insults that you need for your next fight with the fash. 

Game created during the Antifa Game Jam organized by the Montréal Game Curious  collective, on Sunday March 18, in the space of a few hours. 

  • added files with fixes to insult generating arrays 
  • fixed fonts for maximum insultiness
  • added more random ALL CAPS
